# ASTextFieldNode
[AsyncDisplayKit](http://asyncdisplaykit.org/) UITextField wrapper

# Installation
## Carthage
Add the following line to your `Cartfile`

`github "pocketlabs/ASTextFieldNode"`

## CocoaPods
ASTextFieldNode is available on [CocoaPods](https://cocoapods.org).

```
target 'MyApp' do
  pod "ASTextFieldNode"
end
```

# Dependencies
* AsyncDisplayKit 2.0+
